mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolios (user_id, name, name_kana, company, occupation, description) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{nameKana}, #{company}, #{occupation}, #{description}) ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET name = EXCLUDED.name, name_kana = EXCLUDED.name_kana, company = EXCLUDED.company, occupation = EXCLUDED.occupation, description = EXCLUDED.description, updated_at = NOW()
